name: gujarat-real-estate
description: A comprehensive real estate management platform with Firebase and Cloudinary integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install && cd ../GujaratRealEstate-main && npm install
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo 'All builds successful!'

author: Gujarat Real Estate Team
